lead_paragraph: Speculation about a possible transfer to Premier League rivals Arsenal has unsettled Leicester City winger Riyad Mahrez,  manager Claudio Ranieri has said.

headline.print_headline: Mahrez 'Distracted' by Transfer Talk, Says Ranieri
headline.main: Mahrez 'Distracted' by Transfer Talk, Says Ranieri

snippet: Speculation about a possible transfer to Premier League rivals Arsenal has unsettled Leicester City winger Riyad Mahrez,  manager Claudio Ranieri has said....
